VpcId.Description: The VPC in which the stack will reside

SubnetId1.Description: The SubnetId in which the EC2 instances will reside

SubnetId2.Description: The SubnetId in which the EC2 instances will reside

TrustedIPZone.Description: The IP address range that can be used to access the instances
TrustedIPZone.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
